steps.dialogue: Look at the point at 1 on this number line. It shows 6/6. Why does 6/6 equal 1 whole?
steps.prompt: Select the best explanation for why 6/6 = 1.

options.text: 6 parts out of 6 totalâ€”that's all of them, which is 1 whole
Because six sixths is more than five sixths
Because it's past zero on the number line

correct_answer.context: When all parts are present (6 out of 6), they make one complete whole

steps.success_path_dialogue: Exactly. When you have all the parts, you have one whole.
